neighborhoods.name: Altstadt
neighborhoods.character: Historic district featuring the Market Square, cultural institutions, shopping areas, and historic buildings, blending medieval architecture with modern urban life.

location.description: Located in the heart of Heidelberg, featuring the historic market square and surrounding areas, forming the historic and commercial core of the city.

history.overview: Originally established as a medieval trading center, developed as a major cultural and educational hub, largely preserved from WWII damage, now serves as the historic and cultural heart of Heidelberg.
history.significance: Represents Heidelberg's evolution from medieval trading center to modern university town while preserving its cultural and architectural heritage.

practical_info.safety: Very safe area with constant activity and good lighting.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for shopping, afternoon for sightseeing.
practical_info.walkability: Excellent with extensive pedestrian zones and shopping streets.

attractions.name: Marktplatz
attractions.description: Central square featuring the Church of the Holy Spirit, historic buildings, and regular markets, serving as Heidelberg's main gathering place.
attractions.appeal: Experience the heart of Heidelberg with its historic architecture and vibrant atmosphere.

attractions.name: Hauptstraße
attractions.description: Historic shopping street with retail stores and historic buildings.
attractions.appeal: Enjoy premier shopping in a historic setting with a mix of international brands and local shops.

attractions.name: Heiliggeistkirche
attractions.description: Historic church with Gothic architecture and rich history.
attractions.appeal: Visit this architectural gem and historic religious center.

dining.name: Zum Roten Ochsen
dining.atmosphere: Historic restaurant with traditional décor and historic atmosphere.

activities.name: Historic Center Tour
activities.description: Walk through Heidelberg's historic center including the Market Square, Church of the Holy Spirit, and historic streets.

activities.name: Shopping Tour
activities.description: Explore Hauptstraße and surrounding shopping areas.

stay_here_if: You want to be in the heart of Heidelberg's cultural life.
You enjoy shopping and dining options at your doorstep.
You want easy access to public transportation.
avoid_if: You want to avoid tourist crowds.
insider_tips: Visit the market square early morning for the best selection and fewer crowds.
Many museums offer free admission on Wednesday evenings.
The best views of the old town are from the Philosopher's Walk.

neighborhoods.name: Neuenheim
neighborhoods.character: Vibrant district featuring university buildings, student life, cultural venues, and a mix of historic and modern architecture.

location.description: Located north of the city center, characterized by university buildings and residential areas.

history.overview: Developed as a university district, known for its academic institutions and student life, featuring a mix of historic and modern architecture.
history.significance: Represents Heidelberg's academic heritage while maintaining a vibrant student culture.

practical_info.safety: Very safe residential area with good community feeling.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Afternoon for campus life, evening for student culture.
practical_info.walkability: Good with flat terrain and river paths.

attractions.name: University Campus
attractions.description: Historic university buildings and modern facilities.
attractions.appeal: Experience Heidelberg's academic atmosphere in historic surroundings.

attractions.name: Neckar River
attractions.description: Scenic river with walking paths and recreational areas.
attractions.appeal: Enjoy riverside activities and beautiful views.

activities.name: Campus Tour
activities.description: Explore the university buildings and student life areas.

stay_here_if: You want to be near the university.
You enjoy student culture and nightlife.
You want a residential area close to the center.
avoid_if: You want major tourist attractions nearby.
insider_tips: Visit during university term time for vibrant atmosphere.
Many student cafés offer budget-friendly meals.
The river paths are perfect for cycling and jogging.

neighborhoods.name: Bergheim
neighborhoods.character: Historic district known for its classical architecture, cultural heritage, and residential charm, featuring historic buildings and cultural attractions.

location.description: Located west of the city center, featuring historic buildings and residential areas.

history.overview: Originally a separate village, developed as a residential area for wealthy citizens, later became an important cultural and educational center.
history.significance: Represents Heidelberg's cultural heritage and residential development.

practical_info.safety: Very safe residential area with historic character.
practical_info.best_time_to_visit: Morning for historic sites, afternoon for cafés.

attractions.name: Bergheim Palace
attractions.description: Historic palace with gardens and cultural events.
attractions.appeal: Visit this architectural gem and its surrounding gardens.

attractions.name: Historic Villas
attractions.description: Collection of historic villas with unique architecture.

activities.name: Historic Villa Tour
activities.description: Explore the historic villas and gardens of Bergheim.

stay_here_if: You want to be in a historic residential area.
You enjoy cultural heritage and architecture.
avoid_if: You want to be in the city center.
insider_tips: Visit the historic villas during guided tours.
Many historic buildings are visible from the street.
The area is particularly beautiful during spring and autumn.
